ISTLab/WRC currently seeks to fill the following positions:
Postdoctoral Research Associate. The ideal candidate will have a PhD in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration or related discipline and be interested in full-time research/academic career. Prior experience with research project management is necessary.
Doctoral Candidates (PhD students). The ideal candidate should have a Masters (or equivalent) degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration or related discipline and be fluent in English. Prior experience with research projects is welcome, but not necessary.
Research Assistants. The ideal candidate should have a degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration or related discipline and be fluent in English.
If you are interested in any of the above positions, send a detailed CV to the Group leader, indicating which post you are interested in.
